desc: A somewhat suspicious doll of Big Ape.
name: Big Ape Doll

desc: A disorganised map for locating Big Ape. Whoever drew it was very angry.
name: Big Ape Target Map

desc: A computer displaying information downloaded from the drone on top.
name: Minidrone Intel Rack

desc: A display cycling through information about Miniknog strongholds.
name: Miniknog Intel Display

desc: A large propaganda newspaper, to be put up where everyone can see.
name: Miniknog Newspaper

desc: An old torn map which claims to lead to godly treasures.
name: Kluex Treasure Map

desc: An ancient mural of the god Kluex.
name: Kluex World Mural

desc: An ancient mural depicting the gifts given by Kluex to his followers.
name: Kluex Gift Mural

desc: A statue honouring the history of the Avian god Kluex.
name: Kluex Winged Statue

desc: A statue depicting the might of the deity Kluex.
name: Kluex Serpentine Statue

desc: A display commemorating the spear of a Floran who won a hunting ceremony.
name: Champion's Spear Display

desc: A crude painting of a Floran hunter wielding a spear.
name: Primitive Hunter Art

desc: This trophy is a spinneret from some large, web spinning creature.
name: Spinneret Trophy

desc: This trophy rack is covered in a foul web.
name: Web Rack

desc: A small insectile creature impaled on a hunting pike.
name: Ixoling Pike

desc: It's a figurine of a Glitch noble.
name: Glitch Statuette

desc: This chess board has custom pieces.
name: Themed Chess Table

desc: This royal decree makes note of a keep, where treasures lay under watchful guard.
name: Royal Decree

desc: A ceremonial horn that holds a woven banner.
name: Mounted Horn Banner

desc: A wooden desk used by scribes.
name: Scribe's Desk

desc: An old poster of some ancient Hylotl library.
name: Vintage Library Poster

desc: An intricate handmade music box. The melody it plays is soothing.
name: Decorated Music Box

desc: An ancient tome that catalogues of all the Hylotl books in the galaxy.
name: Ancient Library Codex

desc: An intricate handmade paper model of a Hylotl library. There's little paper bookcases inside!
name: Hylotl Library Model

desc: A grand looking aquarium, with a small scale Hylotl pagoda model on top.
name: Pagoda Aquarium
